name: Hundred Finance
desc: Web3 web-app that allows users to buy and sell cryptocurrencies. Reads and writes data to 7 different blockchains.

name: Hundred Finance Dashboard
desc: Web3 dashboards display the performance metrics of Hundred Finance's 7 blockchain networks.

name: Dune Air (Personal Project)
desc: Dune Air lets you book flights to different planets from real airports on Earth, pulling airport codes from RapidAPI. Built from scratch.
